actions.title: Delete old snapshot after verification (snap-old123456789abc)
actions.rollback: Snapshot deletion is irreversible. Before deleting, confirm retention/compliance needs and consider creating a fresh snapshot or copying to a backup vault/account.
actions.notes: Generated from a read-only audit. Verify impact and ownership before applying.

actions.title: Delete old snapshot after verification (snap-0123456789abcdef)
actions.rollback: Snapshot deletion is irreversible. Before deleting, confirm retention/compliance needs and consider creating a fresh snapshot or copying to a backup vault/account.

actions.title: Migrate EBS volume gp2 → gp3 (vol-1111222233334444)
commands: # Test in non-prod first, then migrate:

aws cloudwatch get-metric-statistics --namespace AWS/EBS --metric-name VolumeReadOps --dimensions Name=VolumeId,Value=vol-1111222233334444 --start-time $(date -u -v-1d '+%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S') --end-time $(date -u '+%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S') --period 300 --statistics Average
actions.rollback: You can usually revert by modifying the volume type back to gp2 (note: performance characteristics may differ).
actions.notes: Generated from a read-only audit. Verify impact and ownership before applying.

actions.title: Release unused Elastic IP (34.210.98.76)
commands: # Verify EIP is truly unused (no association):
actions.rollback: Allocate a new Elastic IP and update any DNS / allowlists if you later need a static IP.
actions.notes: Generated from a read-only audit. Verify impact and ownership before applying.
